channel.title: CiTR -- Audio Text (2010)
channel.description: AudioText is 30 minutes of the juiciest Canadian writing you've ever heard your speakers speak. Poetry readings, writer interviews, short stories, science fiction, spoken word recordings, radio plays, and literary event listings welcome your ears home.
channel.itunes:summary: AudioText is 30 minutes of the juiciest Canadian writing you've ever heard your speakers speak. Poetry readings, writer interviews, short stories, science fiction, spoken word recordings, radio plays, and literary event listings welcome your ears home.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: audiotextcitr@gmail.com

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Feb-2010
item.description: poetry from the Pan African slam at Cafe Deux Soleils

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Feb-2010
item.description: A reading from George Elliott Clarke's Illuminated Verses, some tracks from the recent Nerd Slam including Ahmed, RC Weslowski, Steve Locke, Duncan Sheilds,and nerd slam feature Robbie Q Telfer.
item.itunes:subtitle: A reading from George Elliott Clarke's Illuminated Verses, some tracks from the recent Nerd Slam including Ahmed, RC Weslowski, Steve Locke, and nerd slam feature Robbie Q Telfer.

Dig it.

item.itunes:subtitle: An interview and music from Robert Watt of Southpaw, some sweet action from CR Avery, and me being awkward. Love it.

item.title: Broadcast on 06-May-2009
item.description: In honour of Mother's Day, I picked out the most mom-themed poems I could find (which warn't much, to be honest) and assured my mom she's probably better than most of these people's moms, anyway. Steve Miller, Isabelle Ram, Brendan McLeod, and Peter Jaeger feature.
item.itunes:subtitle: A show for my mom, with Steve Miller, Brendan McLeod, Isabelle Ram, and Peter Jaeger
